text: 13.10: 1 Ko 4.21; 2 Ko 2.3; 10.2; 10.8; 12.20-21; Ta 1.14Guma Bakɨme won ŋaara ganɨ zav, nan farasarav, mba ŋaarar muunga ŋkasŋkar na nɨɨŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu ntigem samra kav, kha kameŋ khergiap, nde ndi mbarigi. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, gu nden han zɨrga, gu nden tɨvi ndi thɨgar maan saŋv, havharar nde phorgɨ suangeŋ thagi. Guma Bakɨme na farasarav mba ŋaarar na nɨɨŋgi. Gu nde ana khothɨgi ndɨkndɨgi havharɨrga, gu nden farfarga fhu.
